metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15699 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in app-layer-ssl.c in Suricata 4.1.4. Upon receiving a corrupted SSLv3 (TLS 1.2) packet, the parser function TLSDecodeHSHelloExtensions tries to access a memory region that is not allocated, because the expected length of HSHelloExtensions does not match the real length of the HSHelloExtensions part of the packet.

criterions.comment: suricata package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
